org.presentation.persistence.integration

Interface UserDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserDAOImpl

    public interface UserDAO
    UserDAO interface that serves as layer between business persistence facade and persistence context.
    Author:
    radio.koza

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void create(User user)
      Method creates new user.
      void delete(String email)
      Method deletes user in database specified by user's email address.
      User find(String email)
      Method finds instance of User in database by user's email address.
      void update(User user)
      Updates information about User in database.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        void create(User user)
        Method creates new user. Note that this method fails if user with specified email already exists in database.
        Parameters:
        user - Instance of User to be persisted in database

      • update

        void update(User user)
        Updates information about User in database.
        Parameters:
        user - Instance of User that should be updated

      • delete

        void delete(String email)
        Method deletes user in database specified by user's email address.
        Parameters:
        email - Email address of user that should be deleted from database.

      • find

        User find(String email)
        Method finds instance of User in database by user's email address.
        Parameters:
        email - Email address o wanted user
        Returns:
        Instance of User with specified email address; null if there is no user with such email address
